SELECT t.*, ar.name AS artist_name, al.cover_image FROM track t LEFT JOIN artist ar ON t.artist_id = ar.id LEFT JOIN album al ON t.album_id = al.id WHERE al.release_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) ORDER BY al.release_date DESC, artist_name LIMIT 12

SELECT t.*, ar.name AS artist_name, al.cover_image, al.release_date FROM track t LEFT JOIN artist ar ON t.artist_id = ar.id LEFT JOIN album al ON t.album_id = al.id WHERE al.release_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) ORDER BY al.release_date DESC, artist_name LIMIT #{index}, #{size}

SELECT t.*, (COUNT(DISTINCT tr.id) * 3 + COUNT(DISTINCT lt.id) + COUNT(DISTINCT pd.id)) AS popularity_score, ar.name AS artist_name, al.cover_image FROM track t LEFT JOIN artist ar ON t.artist_id = ar.id LEFT JOIN album al ON t.album_id = al.id LEFT JOIN track_review tr ON t.id = tr.track_id LEFT JOIN liked_track lt ON t.id = lt.track_id LEFT JOIN playlist_detail pd ON t.id = pd.track_id GROUP BY t.id HAVING popularity_score >= 25 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC LIMIT 12

SELECT t.*, (COUNT(DISTINCT tr.id) * 3 + COUNT(DISTINCT lt.id) + COUNT(DISTINCT pd.id)) AS popularity_score, ar.name AS artist_name, al.cover_image FROM track t LEFT JOIN artist ar ON t.artist_id = ar.id LEFT JOIN album al ON t.album_id = al.id LEFT JOIN track_review tr ON t.id = tr.track_id LEFT JOIN liked_track lt ON t.id = lt.track_id LEFT JOIN playlist_detail pd ON t.id = pd.track_id GROUP BY t.id HAVING popularity_score >= 25 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC LIMIT #{index}, #{size}

SELECT t.*, ar.name AS artist_name, al.cover_image, COUNT(DISTINCT lt.id) AS like_count, COUNT(DISTINCT af.id) AS follower_count FROM track t LEFT JOIN artist ar ON t.artist_id = ar.id LEFT JOIN album al ON t.album_id = al.id LEFT JOIN liked_track lt ON t.id = lt.track_id LEFT JOIN artist_follow af ON ar.id = af.artist_id WHERE t.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR ar.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY CASE WHEN t.title = #{keyword} THEN 1 WHEN ar.name = #{keyword} THEN 2 WHEN t.title LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') THEN 3 WHEN ar.name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') THEN 4 WHEN t.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') THEN 5 WHEN ar.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') THEN 6 ELSE 7 END, like_count DESC, follower_count DESC, t.title ASC, ar.name ASC LIMIT 12

SELECT a.*, lt.created_at, a.cover_image FROM track t INNER JOIN liked_track lt ON lt.track_id = t.id INNER JOIN album a ON t.album_id = a.id WHERE lt.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY lt.created_at DESC LIMIT 3
